name: photoark
description: Photo backup and multi-target sync platform with Live Photo aware restore

scripts.dev: npm run dev -w @photoark/api & npm run dev -w @photoark/web
scripts.build: npm run build -w @photoark/shared && npm run build -w @photoark/api && npm run build -w @photoark/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w @photoark/api && npm run lint -w @photoark/web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w @photoark/shared && npm run typecheck -w @photoark/api && npm run typecheck -w @photoark/web
